PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^xE05030^xFFFF77Tips 1-12^7^7
- If you want to Mule I recommend ^xAF6025^x70FF70Duelist^7^7 and going through both ^xD02090Breaking Some Eggs^7 and ^xD02090Mercy Mission^7. This will get you ^xE05030Ancestral Protector^7 and ^xE05030Steelskin^7 along with an extra ^x8888FFQuicksilver Flask^7 and some more gear potential and a couple of extra shops to check for your ^x70FF703 Green Linked Item ^7or^7 ^x70FF702 Green^7 ^x3F6DB31 Blue Link ^7and^7 ^x8888FFMovement Speed Boots^7. This will also guarentee a ^xE05030Medium Life Flask^7 early.
- Check the vendor for ^x8888FFMovement Speed^7 boots and ^x70FF703 Green Linked Item^7 or ^x70FF702 Green^7 ^x3F6DB31 Blue Linked^7. Preferably not a weapon as you will change and upgrade that often.
- ^xE05030Armour^7 and ^xE05030Armour^7/^x70FF70Evasion^7 Hybrid items are useful to pick up and equip early on as they help with ^x8888FFRhoas^7 in Mudflats as well as ^xAF6025Brutus^7.
- Pick up ^x8888FFMagic^7 and^xC8C8C8 ^xFFFF77Rare^xC8C8C8^7 unidentified items and sell them for ^x8888FFTransmutation Fragments^7 early on as you will need a few extra ^x8888FFTransmutes^7 for gems and later for bench crafting.^7
- Buy an Extra ^x8888FFMana Flask^7 before Brutus if you do not have at least 1 medium and one small already. You will likely find a ^x8888FFLarge Mana Flask^7 for 3 ^xE05030Scrolls of Wisdom^7.
- ^xD02090^xFFFF77(NEW 3.21)^7^7 For quicker ^xAF6025Brutus^7 kill get a big 2 handed sword preferably a ^x8888FFLongsword^7 and ^x8888FF2^7 ^x8888FFIron Rings^7 if possible then buy ^x70FF70Puncture^7. If you have 3 or more ^x8888FFTransmutation Orbs^7 you can also buy ^x7070FFEfficacy^7 as well so you will need a ^x70FF70Green^7 ^x7070FFBlue^7 link. ^x70FF70Puncture^7 will trivialize ^xAF6025Brutus^7, apply the ^xE05030bleed^7 and then just hit with ^x70FF70Frostblades^7 when you are safe for an easy kill.
- You do not need to use a claw until late Act 2/Early Act 3. ^x70FF70Whirling Blades^7 requires a claw, dagger or one handed sword and before ^xAF6025Brutus^7 use the highest damage weapon you get no matter what. ^xFFFF77(NEW 3.21)^7^7^7 You now get access to ^x70FF70Faster Attacks ^7at level 8 so make sure to get that to link with ^x70FF70Whirling Blades^7.
^xFFFF77(NEW 3.21)^7^7^7 You can now keep ^x70FF70Precision^7 at level 1 forever. Making room for other auras and more mana to play with.
- Use ^x70FF70Blade Trap^7 for ^xAF6025Mervail^7. Swap the gems so the ^x70FF70Blade Trap^7 setup is in a 3 link with ^x70FF70Added Cold Damage^7 and ^x70FF70Swift Assembly^7. Setup traps on her and keep ^x3F6DB3Frost Bomb^7 up as well.
^xFFFF77Tips 12-24^7
- You will start to acquire gems you won't use yet such as ^x70FF70Nightblade^x70FF70 ^x7070FFTrinity ^7and ^xE05030Elemental Damage With Attacks.^7 Put weapons/shields in your weapon swap so that you can have access to these.
- Help ^x7070FFAlira^x7070FF ^7for the bandits, her stats will be very useful but we will respec later at around level 90 to get the skillpoints.
- Towards the end of this act make sure you pick up a ^xFFFF77Claw^7 base as you will now start getting ^xFFFF77Claw^7 specific nodes. Use ^x7070FFEssences^7 if you have any to craft one.
- After Vaal Oversoul or Crematorium you can drop^x70FF70 Blade Trap^7.
- ^xFFFF77(NEW 3.21)^7^7^7 Get the ^xD02090Elemental Mastery^7 that inverts enemy ele resist 25% of hits by taking ^xD02090Forces of Nature^7 earlier. This will make bossing MUCH easier, between 25-40% more dps against bosses at all stages and nearly double damage against the resist mod rares.
^xFFFF77Tips 24-34
^7- ^xFFFF774 Links^7 become available at the vendor at level 24 starting in Act 3 and the vendor resets whenever you gain a level so check when you are in town if you don't find one on the ground.
- ^xFFFF77(NEW 3.21)^7^7^7 You will now want to pick ^x7070FFWrath ^7over ^x70FF70Hatred ^7as your aura. This will give you ^x7070FFShock ^7and earlier access to ^x7070FFTrinity^7 which is very strong. You can also use ^x7070FFElemental Weakness^7 until you get your mark on hit setup.
- ^7In Act 4 you will want some extra ^x8888FFTransmutes^7 ^7for bench crafting so if you don't have at least 8 extra ones start picking up ^xFFFF77Rare^xFFFF77 ^7bases to sell for shards again. ^xFFFF77(NEW 3.21)^7^7^7 ^7You get access to ^x7070FFLightning Damage Crafts ^7after killing ^xAF6025Piety^7 that you will use instead of the ^x7070FFCold Damage Crafts^7 ^7from Act 4.
^xFFFF77Tips 34-55
^7^7- The Crystal Veins in Act 4 unlocks ^x3F6DB3Cold Damage Crafts. ^7Use these on any jewelry or weapon you have open prefixes on for a good damage boost. ^xFFFF77(NEW 3.21)^7^7^7^7 ^xC8C8C8Only do this if you have a very early ^xAF6025Heatshiver^7 and some extra freeze chance via ^xAF6025Tasalio's Sign^7 ^7for example. Otherwise go ^x7070FFLightning Damage.^7
- Upon defeating ^xD02090Kitava^7 and entering Act 6 you will recieve a resistance drop. This is the time to make sure your gear is sorted as this act can be difficult if you don't have decent ^7resistances. Don't be afraid to use resources such as ^xFFFF77Essences, Orb of Binding, ^7and the Crafting bench to upgrade your gear. Try to have 50+ all ^xADAA47^xFFFF77^7^xD02090elemental^xD02090 ^7resists^7^7 at the least before starting Act 6.
- Around this time we are switching to the end game setup. Grab all the gems and put the ones you can't use in your weapon swap to level. Start going towards ^x70FF70Frenzy Charges^7 around level 50 and switch to ^x70FF70Ice Bite^7 when you get some levels on it and the 4th ^x70FF70Frenzy^7 in preparation for the 2nd Lab.
^xFFFF77Tips 55-Act10
- ^7Try to get the^7 ^xFFFF77Mark Mastery^7 for ^x70FF70Frenzy Charges^7 on hit against marked enemies as soon as you can after switching to ^x70FF70Ice Bite^7 to keep frenzies up at all times along with ^x7070FF^x70FF70Poacher's Mark^7 ^7on hit setup.^7^7 ^xFFFF77(NEW 3.21)^7^7^7^7^7 ^7Since you may no longer take ^xD02090Precise Technique^7 you can go right for ^x7070FFAssassin's Mark.^7
- I like to get my 3rd ascendancy right after getting the skill point in Act 10 but you can grab it whenever you'd like. Make sure you start getting Masteries first for the big damage boost.
- Craft ^xE05030Bleed/Corrupted Blood^7 immune as soon as you get a ^xE05030Divine Life Flask^7.
- ^xFFFF77(NEW 3.21)^7^7^7^7^7 ^7Keep using ^x7070FFWrath^7 and ^7^x7070FFLightning Damage^7 weapons/jewelry until you get ^xAF6025Heatshiver^7 and ^xAF6025Yoke of Suffering^7. The ^x7070FFShock^7 and ^x7070FFTrinity^7 are worth it.
^xFFFF77Tips Early Maps
^7- Make sure you are ele resist capped before maps. If you are not you can farm ^xFFFF77Heists ^7or ^xFFFF77The Desecrated Chambers ^7in act 10 to get some gear and crafting resources. Bench Craft to finish.
- Focus on Jun Mission and ^xFFFF77Essence^7 ^7points on your atlas skill tree for the first 10 points to help with crafting gear and getting Unveil unlocks.
- Remove people from your betrayal board until you are sure you have ^xFFFF77^xD02090^xAF6025^xE05030Gravicius and Elreon^7 on it as you will need their signiture crafts. ^xFFFF77(NEW 3.21)^7^7^7^7^7 ^7^xE05030Elreon^7 ^7may no longer be needed because of the new ^xE05030Life Mastery^7 ^7that diverts 30% of ^x7070FFMana Cost^7 ^7to ^xE05030Life Cost^7.
- If you are in SSF start putting aside any ^xFFFF77Magic Find^7 gear that has good stats on top of the magic find as you will need it later to hunt for the core uniques.
- Start getting as much ^xFFFF77^x70FF70Spell Suppression^7^7 as possible with the goal of being at 100% by red maps.
^xFFFF77Tips Yellow to Early Red Maps
^7- At some point here you will do ^xD02090Uber Lab, ^7if you are unable to find a trial to get an ^xFFFF77Offering to the Goddess ^7do Kirac missions and look for one that has complete a trial of ascendancy. ^xFFFF77(NEW 3.21)^7^7^7^7^7^7 ^xC8C8C8^xD02090Ritual^7 and ^x3F6DB3Delve^7 ^7are also great ways to get ^xFFFF77Offering to the Goddess^7 as they are pretty common drops there.
- Get some ^xD02090Kirac Mission^7 and higher tier map drop chance nodes on the Atlas tree to make progression easier and so you can stack up ^xD02090Kirac Missions^7 to get Atlas completion later. You can then get the ^xFFFF77Strongbox Nodes^7 nearby so you can start getting ^x8888FFScarabs^7 and chances at ^xD02090Corrupted 6 Links^7.
- If you hit a wall and don't have the core uniques yet you can do some ^xFFFF77Magic Finding^7 in low maps. Put on your best magic find gear while remaining resist capped and allocate ^xD02090Enriched Entities ^7on the Atlas Tree. Run low level maps with multiple bosses such as ^xFFFF77Strand and Vaal Pyramid.^7 The bosses tend to drop a ton of uniques especially with good Quant/Rarity and can be doubled. ^xFFFF77(NEW 3.21)^7^7^7^7^7^7 ^7With the new ^x7070FFWrath^7 and ^x7070FFLightning Damage^7 strategy you can go all the way to T16s without any ^xAF6025Uniques^7 so doing that and making currency trade is better. Still do this in SSF though.
- If you are having trouble capping ^x70FF70Spell Suppression ^7do some ^xD02090Atziri ^7runs to get ^xAF6025Atziri's Step. ^7Allocate the Pantheon ^xFFFF77Soul of Yugul ^7and the ^x7070FFElemental Mastery ^7that reduces reflect damage as otherwise you will die to ^xD02090Atziri's ^7split stage from her Mirror holding clone.
^xFFFF77Early End Game Goals
^7- Alter Farm to acquire tons of needed currency, especially map currency as you will be respeccing your atlas passive tree somewhat frequently. Underground Sea is my favorite Alter Farming map.
- Make sure Flasks are crafted properly. You will need 20 ^x8888FFInstilling Orbs^7. ^x8888FFGlassblower's Baubles ^7are easy as you can trade whetstones for them at vendor.
- Always run ^xFFFF77^x7070FFHarvest^7^7 as it is used for many things, especially in SSF including crafting, swapping ^xD02090Pinnacle Boss Fragments^7, swapping ^xFFFF77Scarabs/Essences^7, swapping ^xD02090Legion/Breach Fragments^7 etc. It's probably wise to keep at least a few ^x7070FFHarvest ^7nodes allocated no matter what you are doing so you are always building resources.
- Expedition is great to use early on as ^xE05030Rog^7 will help with gear upgrades and especially ^xFFFF77Jewel^7 crafting. ^x7070FFTujen^7 ^7is also nice for currency early on. I'd skip ^x70FF70Gwennen ^7though honestly.
- ^x8888FFDelve^7 ^7is very helpful for map sustain, you are start it at least by the end of yellow maps. The city nodes contain a ton of maps and respect your preferred map slots so make sure you ^x8888FFDelve^7 a bit before hitting T14+ maps so you can use this.
- Clean up the ^x70FF70^xD02090Eldritch^7^7 quests when you are pretty comfortable farming T16 maps and do all the ^x7070FF^xD02090Mave^7^xD02090n^7^7 stuff up to 10 witnessed bosses.
^xFFFF77Refining the Build Goals
^7- Start here once you are easily farming T16s and have all the base uniques as well as a good amount of ^xFFFF77Orb of Unmaking^7 for respecs.
^7- Acquire ^xAF6025Lethal Pride^7 that fits into one of the nodes by your ^x70FF70Frenzy Charges^7.^7 Aim for at least 1 double damage roll and 2 more useful rolls or better otherwise keep farming ^xD02090Legion^7. ^xFFFF77(NEW 3.21)^7^7^7^7^7^7 The top socket by Ghost Dance is much better now as we have 13 notables allocated there in the end game opening up and insane amount of good ^xAF6025Lethal Pride^7 options.
- Look for ^xFFFF77Cluster Jewels^7. Priority for Large is ^x3F6DB3Cold^7 > ^xD02090Elemental^7 = ^xAF6025Claw^7. You will then want Either 1 ^x70FF70Crit^7 and 1^x7070FF Ailment Effect^7 medium or 2 ^x7070FFAilment Effects^7.
- ^xAF6025^7Acquire ^xAF6025Circle of Fear ^7from Sythesis memory maps. Allocate all of the Synthesis map nodes on your Atlas tree and make Mesa your favorite map on all slots. Get a ton of Mesas from ^x8888FF^x8888FFDelve ^7cities, Singular Focus (Unspec out of this before you run the Mesas though) or any other methods and once you have a ton just alc and go them just rushing the boss in the center. Double boss maps or ^xD02090Eldrich Entities ^7are helpful for this too. You should be able to get some quick synthesis maps this way and if you want you can get the other guardian map nodes during this farm to double up on the potential value. ^xFFFF77(NEW 3.21)^7^7^7^7^7^7 Mesa is no longer available but I will review which maps can replace it. My first thought is Beach but I will see if there is something better.
- Farm ^x70FF70^x70FF70Hunter ^7for ^x70FF70Hunter Influence Shields ^7or ^x70FF70Hunters Exalted Orb ^7to get your final aura setup with the 30% ^x7070FFReduced Mana Reservation^7 mod. ^xFFFF77(NEW 3.21)^7^7^7^7^7^7 ^7This is no longer necessary to use the core build but could still be worth it to do if you want to fit in another aura.
- ^7Farm^7 ^xD02090Elder^7 or ^xD02090Uber Elder^7 for ^xAF6025Watchers Eye^7. You are looking for^x3F6DB3 Flat Cold Damag^7^x3F6DB3e^7 with ^x3F6DB3Hatred^7 ^7but can also use most ^x3F6DB3Hatred^7 mods or ^x70FF70Precision ^x8888FF^7^7^7ones.
^7
^7
